text: A superfluous precaution for there was no other car abroad; and no pedestrian to cross his path nor to wait at an intersection for the light to change. At his apartment he garaged his car and then stood listening in the night. Listening in vain. For the earth had lost its life-tempo, as the heart loses its beat in death.
handwritten_text: A superfluous precaution for there was no other car abroad; and no pedestrian to cross his path nor to wait at an intersection for the light to change. At his apartment he garaged his car and then stood listening in the night. Listening in vain. For the earth had lost its life-tempo, as the heart loses its beat in death.
